TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityMarkupSerializer extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: 在設計階段為 提供 eXtensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 序列化 (Serialization) 服務。

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer> 會提供方法，可用來將活動類別物件序列化為 XAML 格式，並將 XAML 內容還原序列化為活動類別物件。 這些服務主要是由活動設計工具用來保存工作流程設計介面上的類別。
如需序列化的詳細資訊，請參閱[序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d1111c0-9447-4231-a997-96a2b74b3453)。

public: ActivityMarkupSerializer();

Docs.summary: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

Docs.summary: 使用指定的 來建立指定之 的執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void OnAfterSerialize (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager serializationManager, object obj);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnAfterSerialize(class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager serializationManager, object obj) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnAfterSerialize (serializationManager As WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager, obj As Object)
protected: override void OnAfterSerialize(System::Workflow::ComponentModel::Serialization::WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager ^ serializationManager, System::Object ^ obj);

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A> 方法，並且在 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> 上執行序列化後處理之後，立即呼叫 `obj`，這主要可以格式化並縮排 .xoml 檔案中的程式碼和 eXtensible Application Markup Language (XAML)。

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void OnBeforeSerialize (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager serializationManager, object obj);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnBeforeSerialize(class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager serializationManager, object obj) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnBeforeSerialize (serializationManager As WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager, obj As Object)
protected: override void OnBeforeSerialize(System::Workflow::ComponentModel::Serialization::WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager ^ serializationManager, System::Object ^ obj);

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A> 指定的活動上執行 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> 方法之前，立即呼叫 `obj`。 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnBeforeSerialize%2A> 寫入活動的開頭 eXtensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 標記，包括任何必要屬性。

Docs.exception: 、 或 包含 null 參考 (Visual Basic 中為 )。
